attributes.action: ensure that if unemployed people are being made to work in order to receive Job Seekers Allowance that they be paid at least the Minimum Wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the fact that unemployment remains high, the Government are going to make the jobless work for their "dole money", without getting anything extra for doing so. This will make the new scheme even worse than New Deal which pays £15 a week, and will cause the genuine jobless to feel that they are being punished. If the unemployed work, they should be given the Minimum Wage rather than being used as a source of cheap labour.
